data.actual_result: Both of the modals are open at the same time
data.expected_result: The Recent Mentions modal should close upon opening the Help modal
data.short_description: The Recent Mentions modal and the Help modal can be displayed at the same time if you change settings in Recent Mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your Recent Mentions (the @ at the top right of the app) - Click the "Display:" dropdown - Change one of the settings - Click to open the Help modal (the ? at the top right of the app)
